entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 19.
